name: mpt2ex
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wcel(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), universe)

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)))
